name: You have One Shot
description:
One Bullet left in the Chamber, With many Enemies Surrounding You. Kill Groups of Enemies by Lining them up and taking the shot! Earn more bullets for every additional enemy you kill in a Combo! 

"You have One Shot" was built from the ground up in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam. The Theme was "Only One", so at the start of every level, you have one bullet; and to earn more, you have to get Combo Kills. Did I Mention that you also only have one HP?

As a Side Note, Time Slows down when you Jump. That's Pretty Cool, Isn't it?

This is the Second Game Jam I've Ever Participated in, so go easy on the reviews, eh?
